column1: # Activity not related to major resections and surgical outcomes is not presented for tertiary cancer centres.

* The risk adjusted estimates for 90-day mortality, 30-day unplanned readmissions and 2-year mortality for this Trust are not presented due to the amount of missing risk adjustment data (ASA grade and/or pathological TNM staging).
